Articles.Content: Hey everyone, very new to the game still figuring everything out. Just wondering though how does one activate an action group on Xbox one?
You should be able to hit the y button in flight and it brings up the radial menu. From that point go to action groups.

My "Abort button" doesn't seem to work on XB1.

I've assigned a couple of simple tasks like engine shutdown and engine jettison to the Abort function, but hitting the button on the altimeter doesn't do anything in flight.

 

Is this a bug or am I doing something wrong?
